#labels Phase-Deploy
Instructions on installing the W3C python test tool for Windows

First, install python from http://www.python.org/
  * Extract to `c:\python25\`
  * Add `c:\python25\` to your path (My Computer -> Properties -> Advanced -> Environment Variables)

Second, follow these [http://boodebr.org/main/python/build-windows-extensions steps to get mingw] (and gcc to compile things).

Third, get [http://rdflib.net/ rdflib].
  * Extract to `c:\rdflib`
  * From the command line, run `python setup install`
  * Repeat if prompted

Fourth, get the [http://www.w3.org/TR/grddl-tests/#deliverables grddl-tests] zip file
 * Extract somewhere useful

== See also ==
[http://www.w3.org/TR/grddl-tests/#testft W3C GRDDL test suite]
